mapper.select: SELECT /*+ index_desc(tbl_user) */ u.user_nickname, u.user_address, u.user_latitude, u.user_longitude, u.user_gender, ps.pro_photo, ps.introduce FROM tbl_user u INNER JOIN tbl_petsitter_profile ps on u.user_no = ps.user_no WHERE u.user_no = #{userNo}

SELECT /*+ index_desc(tbl_petsitter_profile) */ ps.user_no, st.service_type_code, st.price FROM tbl_petsitter_profile ps INNER JOIN tbl_service_type st on ps.user_no = st.user_no WHERE ps.user_no = #{userNo} AND st.use_yn = 'Y'
SELECT /*+ index_desc(tbl_petsitter_profile) */ ps.user_no, sc.service_date FROM tbl_petsitter_profile ps INNER JOIN tbl_service_calendar sc on ps.user_no = sc.user_no WHERE ps.user_no = #{userNo}

SELECT /*+ index_desc(tbl_petsitter_profile) */ ps.user_no, sk.pet_type_code FROM tbl_petsitter_profile ps INNER JOIN tbl_service_petkinds sk on ps.user_no = sk.user_no WHERE ps.user_no = #{userNo} AND sk.use_yn = 'Y'

SELECT /*+ index_desc(tbl_petsitter_profile) */ ps.user_no, psk.skill_type_code FROM tbl_petsitter_profile ps INNER JOIN tbl_petsitter_skill psk on ps.user_no = psk.user_no WHERE ps.user_no = #{userNo} AND psk.use_yn = 'Y'

SELECT /*+ index_desc(tbl_petsitter_profile) */ ps.user_no, acp.photo_no, acp.act_photo FROM tbl_petsitter_profile ps INNER JOIN tbl_activity_photo acp on ps.user_no = acp.user_no WHERE ps.user_no = #{userNo}

SELECT /*+ index_desc(tbl_service_matching) */ sm.pet_sitter_no, rev.rev_content, rev.writer, rev.writer_date, rep.rep_content, rep.writer, rep.writer_date FROM tbl_service_matching sm INNER JOIN tbl_review rev on sm.service_id = rev.service_id INNER JOIN tbl_reply rep on rev.service_id = rep.service_id WHERE sm.pet_sitter_no = #{userNo}
